name: Zoxel
description:
Zoxel is a Roguelike Action Adventure RPG with my focus being on procedural generation and story telling.

I'm remaking some of my old prototype voxel games. A huge bottleneck for me before was performance. Which isn't an issue with ECS, so hopefully I can keep pushing this project to new levels. So far i've got alot of the basic core systems working.

Remaking similar systems from previous games including typical RPG Stuff: Items, Stats, Skills, Quests, Dialogue, Mobs and more.

So far i've got the basic voxel engine and some core gameplay stuff worked out.
